import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' class CreateTodo extends Component { state = { discription: '', responsible: '', priority: '', isCompleted: false } onChangeTodoHandler = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) console.log(this.state) } onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(this.state) const newTodo = { discription: this.state.discription, responsible: this.state.responsible, priority: this.state.priority, isCompleted: false } axios.post('http://localhost:5000', newTodo) .then(res => console.log(res.data)) } componentDidUpdate(){ e.preventDefault(); console.log(this.state) const newTodo = { discription: this.state.discription, responsible: this.state.responsible, priority: this.state.priority, isCompleted: false } } render() { return (

Create New Todo

) } } export default CreateTodo
